description.narrative: Funding under this initiatives provides support to the International Labour Organisation (ILO) to fund sustainable employment activities in Asia and the Pacific regions. Australia's contribution will support: Better Work in Bangladesh, Cambodia, Indonesia and Vietnam to improve working conditions by assisting companies to improve compliance with international labour standards and conventions; Green Jobs in Asia, specifically Bangladesh, Indonesia, Nepal, Philippines and Sri Lanka to develop the capacity of trade unions and employer organisations to generate green job creation opportunities and conditions for a transition for workers and employers to a low carbon, climate resilient and environmentally friendly nature; Pacific Global Jobs Pact in Kiribati, Papua New Guinea, Samoa, Tuvalu and Vanuatu to improve labour governance, including migration through increased legislative protection and more equitable conditions; and Pacific Growth Plan to develop understanding about industries in
